name: Decay Dungeons
description:
Your job is to protect the elixir of life to stop the ghosts from returning to the living and the only way to dispose of these rogue spirits is by splashing them with water from the Styx -an ancient river in the underworld- and you do this by demolishing the dirt under you making water splash onto the ghosts, also be careful not to let any water touch you or you will disintegrate too.

-SFX from Pixabay

-Water shader by Gregnow
